long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Esparkify is a software platform that leverages powerful market intelligence to eliminate the guesswork when evaluating and ranking multiple products to sell on online marketplaces such as Amazon. Our tools simplify the product research process and allow anyone to stay competitive, increase profitable market share growth and manage their inventories at scale by the practice of using AI, machine learning, analytics and automation.

Our mission at Esparkify is to create a more inclusive capitalism.
